title: new arcade skin????
body:
HEY

     my fellow players just wondering should they bring a new arcade skin out???
just thinking about it and a new skin arcade would be nice i got {{champion:92}} arcade and seen all the others and there cool but just thinking WE NEED A NEW ONE 
i was thinking 3 new arcade champs {{champion:161}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:245}} thinking one of these 3 would be cool thank you guys for reading and VOTE ON POLE

replies.body: {{champion:161}} cant be an arcade skin since Final Boss {{champion:45}} is already the Final boss skin for mid lane. What they really need is a Boss type {{champion:27}} Skin. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AxY4zus6iUI . As top lane currently has no Boss skin for top lane and {{champion:27}} would suit it very well since there is alot you can do with him because of how he is. The already design (Arcade) {{champion:27}} could be easily turned into a Boss skin of somesort
He can be an arcade just not a boss :) I think they intend to do five for each eventually.

lol cool a couple of minor changes to the skin and that would be cool hahaha 
if they did make a arcade gel his ult should be RAINBOWS hahaha{{summoner:30}}
i ment vel not gel hahaha or just{{champion:161}}
Well they already have Vei in mid for the 'bad guys', Vel would make a great video game boss, but I reckon it'd make a fab Arcade skin too. He doesn't have a  legendary yet either!

Arcade {{champion:238}} would be mean. Arcade {{champion:238}} would be the sidekick to final boss veigar hahaha. I can't imagine rito actually doing this but if they do holy molly that would be freakin' awesome and funny.

Considering EVERY arcade skin has been released in August, might be a while.

{{champion:37}} (Aug 2012), {{champion:120}} (Aug 2013), {{champion:21}}  & {{champion:45}}  (Aug 2014), {{champion:92}} & {{champion:53}} (Aug 2015)

2 x Supports, 2x Top, 1 ADC, 1 Mid. Riot like releasing skins that make up a traditional "team".

So probably looking at an ADC and Mid laner as well as 2 junglers. Unless you count Hecarim as a jungler, so there would be another top lane skin available.
{{champion:120}}  is counted as jungler, hes mainly played there
I don't know about that. He did start as a jungler, but he was primarily a top laner for like 90% of last season.
True but Riven has already taken top for the Arcade team
ya, i'd go with Raid Boss Vi, Bossy Kalista and Hell Boss Illaoi to round out the evil guys. Maybe Arcade Ekko as your midlaner for the good guys... Or Arcade Syndra. That would be hella cool imo.
I like the boss names you have :)
